title: permamnent banned
body: Im permanent banned, ik why because I am toxic to the point where i get reported, when I was banned for 14 days, i learned my lesson idk why i got a perma for expressing my feelings in a nicer way, all it is , is frustration. I tried to be not toxic.

replies.body: i got perm banned and never got an email, im currently over seas and ill be back home in 10 months, idk how i got banned or why, becuase im not toxic and if i am i apologize to whoever i was toxic to, but i tested game in server i was in and it was like 200 ping, so not horrible, but not good enough to play in, but i never changed servers becuase league is only way to communicate with my friends at home, ive never had a 14 day ban or anything, ive never had a warning, nothing, this was a total random thing and no one is helping me, its like my account got banned for 0 reasons
